title: IT60113: Advanced Database Systems - Quick Facts

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: A brief overview of relational databases. Advanced concepts in SQL Deductive Databases. Spatial and Temporal databases. Active Databases. Object Oriented Databases and Object-Relational Databases. Multimedia Databases. Distributed Databases. Multi-dimensional and high dimensional data. Data distribution properties of high dimensions. Nearest neighbor and range queries in high dimensional databases. Approximate searches. R-tree and its variants. Biological databases ? Searches in discrete data spaces.
